meanings.sent1: The doughiest bread I ever tasted was so soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: Her cookies were the doughiest in the whole bakery.
meanings.sent3: The doughiest pizza crust I've ever seen was like a fluffy cloud on a plate.
meanings.sent4: The doughiest blanket enveloped me in warmth like a cozy hug.
meanings.sent5: The doughiest playdough was perfect for molding into fun shapes.

meanings.definition: Resembling dough in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The doughiest clay was easy to mold into different shapes.
meanings.sent2: The doughiest clouds floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The doughiest sweater looked so cozy and comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, soft and doughiest, fell in gentle waves around her face.
meanings.sent5: The doughiest mooncake was a delight to eat during the festival.
